name: Exceedion

overview:
Exceedion is an Indianapolis Web design and development based firm specializing in results driven, best in class websites.

Marketers and executives know that todayâ€™s websites must deliver compelling content and drive measurable results. Exceedion provides the technical expertise to support your vision and maximize your websites performance. Our web design and development solutions allow you to clearly communicate and connect to your users while measuring your results. This allows marketers to analyze and monitor your website and make informed marketing decisions to maximize your ROI. Our results driven process of plan, design, build, optimize, market and measure will deliver the business results your company requires.

Founded in 2004, Exceedion has provided exceptional web experiences for over 120 clients.
